pr_title: Add limitation to Session Property Manager file

timeline.bodyText: leave old style consistent for now
timeline.author: mosabua
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -24,7 +24,7 @@ by default. All matching rules contribute to constructing a list of session prop
 are applied in the order they are specified. Rules specified later in the file override values
 for properties that have been previously encountered.
 
-Match Rules
+Match rules

timeline.bodyText:
Do not user uppercase .. these are not unique names as such.
The session property manager only supports system session properties and doesn't support not catalog session properties.
timeline.author: mosabua

replies.bodyText:
Good insight from Manfred.
I would also remove abbreviation and double 'not'.
The session property manager only supports system session properties and does not support catalog session properties.
replies.author: mfzarko

timeline.author: mosabua
